You have finished your meditation session.

" Medical Disclaimer:

""The application Seven Minutes Workout does not constitute " "medical advice. Before starting any workout program or following sports-related advice, " "it is strongly recommended that you consult a doctor or a qualified healthcare " "professional, especially if you have pre-existing medical conditions, injuries, or " "physical limitations.

"
"Disclaimer of Liability:

""The use of the Seven Minutes Workout application is " "at your own risk. Under no circumstances can Seven Minutes Workout be held responsible " "for any injuries, accidents, illnesses, or other damages that may result from the use of " "this application.

"
"Injury Disclaimer:

""The Seven Minutes Workout application is designed to " "provide information and workout programs. However, it is your responsibility to ensure " "that you are physically capable of following these programs. If you experience pain, " "dizziness, or any other unusual symptoms during an exercise, stop immediately and " "consult a doctor.

"
"Safety Advice:

""Before starting any exercise, ensure that you have a safe " "environment for practicing your physical activities.Respect your physical limits and " "avoid overestimating your abilities. Self-diagnosis and self-treatment can be dangerous. " "Stay hydrated regularly and take breaks when necessary.

"
"No Warranty:

""The Seven Minutes Workout application is provided as is " "without any warranties of any kind, express or implied, regarding the results you may " "achieve through the use of the application.

"
"Proper Use:

""The application should only be used by individuals in good " "physical and mental health. If you have any doubts about your ability to follow the " "workouts, consult a doctor before using the application.

"
"Privacy:

""All personal data collected by the application is used in accordance " "with our privacy policy, available in the app's settings or on our website. We are " "committed to protecting your privacy and not sharing your information with unauthorized " "third parties.

"
"Limitation of Liability:

""Seven Minutes Workout developers disclaims all " "liability for any misuse of the application, misinterpretation of instructions, or any " "consequences arising from the improper use of the information provided.

"
"Changes to Terms:

""These legal notices and terms may be modified at any time. " "It is the user's responsibility to regularly check this section to stay informed of any " "changes.

"
